授業目的: Research Seminar will improve students' abilities to conduct research and analyses on themes of their own choices.
到達目標:
Through group and individual guidance and consultation with the faculty, the students will carry out research/analyses on their research theme of interest. The first part of the Research Seminar (Spring) consists of (1) case discussion, (2) guest lecturers’ sessions, and (3) sharing thoughts and ideas with other students and guest lecturers. Students are expected to submit a research proposal in the middle of the Fall semester and continue to work on their theses in the following year.
